title: Coronation Street's Ruxandra Porojnicu works gruelling second job alongside soap filming
text:

Coronation Street actress Ruxandra Porojnicu has told that she works in a cafe alongside her prestigious acting gig.

It recently emerged that EastEnders' Katie Jarvis works on security for B&M.

Ruxandra, who plays Alina Pop, took to Twitter to write a series of posts: "I worked all summer in a cafe and I will keep this job for as long as I can while also going up to Manchester and film.

"And yes, it wasn't easy after 6 months of living any actor's dream to work on set full time.

"I wanted to quit and I cried a lot because it's so stressful working in customer service!

"Also, I couldn't believe I have to do it again. Imagine having a family to take care of! Is not easy being constantly with or without job. Is true it affects your mental health as an actor!!

"But hey! There was no other alternative right away, didn't know what the future will bring and I couldn't just wait without doing anything.

"There's no shame in working. I would rather feel ashamed being lazy and complain I don't have money or ask my family to provide for me."

Ruxandra went on to express solidarity with artists who are working other jobs to get by, writing: "Well done to all of you hard working artists out there. You should be proud of yourselves.

"Thank you for inspiring me!"

On the show, her character Alina is thought to be a modern day slave. She's also grown close to love interest Seb Franklin.

(Image: BBC)

Katie has since praised Britain's working class and said that she's always worked other jobs between acting gigs.

She told Victoria Derbyshire: "All actors go through it over the years, I've had so many jobs in between and not just being a security guard."

She discussed the struggles at the start of her career, when she landed a role in the film Fish Tank.

"At 17, when I got Fish Tank," Katie said, "I was doing doughnuts with my uncle at the time at festivals and things like that so I'd go on there and do the food carts."

Later she added: "I've been a waitress, I've worked at a credit card company, I've done admin, I've done all types of things."
description: The star said she has a side job in a cafe 'while also going up to Manchester and film' after it emerged EastEnders' Katie Jarvis works as a security guard
